 2001-10382001-06-060,  PMO,  JUS,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE LANCE S.G. FINCH as Chief Justice of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia, with the style and title of Chief Justice of British Columbia, and as Chief Justice of the Court of Appeal for the Yukon Territory during his tenure of office as Chief Justice of British Columbia.
